Title: Guess Whose Back
Description: <This dragon turtle's massive shell is rock-hard and covered in sharp ridges. One of the locals could almost certainly make use of it.>
ObjectivesText: Bring Krosh's Back to Yan in New Cifera.
RewardText:
My MY now look at THIS! What a beautiful shell!

You were wise to bring this to me, my friend. It will make a fantastic serving platter.

Please, take this for your troubles.
